attributes.action: create a department of government expenditure (DOGE)
attributes.additional_details: The government need to be transparent in the spending of the tax payers money and the tax payer needs to see where the hard earned and heavily taxed money is being spent, we need this set up ASAP and ran by an independent committee to ensure no corruption.
attributes.background: In The USA Elon Musk is heading a department of government expenditure (DOGE) and has uncovered billions of dollars worth of wasted money, we need this in the UK ASAP in order to help save our country try form pointless and corrupt spending.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Create the Department of Government Efficiency
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
